Banner.Description: I have 3+ years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web and mobile app a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and Node.js applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 3 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing Clean & Reusable code, Creating Database Architecture, and covering backend developer roles with Node.js and Mysql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Creation and maintenance of a monitoring platform with mircoservices in NestJs.
Functional programming in templates and plugins to add the necessary monitoring features.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Creation and maintenance of a second Monitoring Platform Done in Angular, Angular Material, Node.js, Mysql, RxJS, Sass with graphics (configurable), alarm system, and user management and configuration of general parameters.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior software developer
Description: Leading a team of 7 developers in the development of a Animal welfare platform made in Angular, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
Implementation Database Architecture, Refactoring and optimizing application load times.
Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Writing weekly reports about goals and plans.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Graduate engineer trainee
Description: Creation of mircoservices in NestJs with ACF, functional programming in Javascript / TypeScript
integration of design improvements, and template loading times.
Effective communication with the design team, working with Avocode / Figma.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Quicko
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Participated in Agile software development practices & workflows, Worked on a FinTech product(Tax preparation & filing platform). Explored rich technology stack consisting Angular applications like product web-apps & product dashboard

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lenditt - Your Financial buddy
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Used advanced concepts of Angualar like RxJS, NgRx (State-Management), Lazy loading & Angular Material, Reactive forms in multiple projects. Worked on a FinTech product(NBFC digital lending platform). With leading Technology stack consisting of Angular applications for product dashboard & tools, NodeJS (NestJS) backend service, PostgreSQL & Firebase NoSQL database.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Fairdogs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Worked on a animal welfate platform where users can seek animal care and animals care collaborate in order to better protect animals. It consists of rich technology stack consists of Angular web application, Angular admin panel, Node.js mircoservices, MySQL, MongoDB. It also has partial integration for wordpress.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hands game
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Countries viewer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An interface that consumes an API of countries with which you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
